component.description: This is an implementation of the HTML meta tag.

property.description: The content attribute is used to specify the data to associate with a name attribute or httpEquiv attribute in the ui:meta tag.

property-extension.short-description: Specifies the data to associate with a name or httpEquiv attribute

property.description: The httpEquiv attribute is used to specify a value for the http-equiv attribute of an HTML Meta element. The http-equiv attribute specifies HTTP properties that the web server can use in the HTTP response header.

property-extension.short-description: Specifies HTTP properties that the web server can use in the HTTP response header

property.description: The identifier that is assigned to a property in the meta element. The content attribute provides the actual content of the property that is identified by the name attribute.

property-extension.short-description: Specify the name of an attribute which is associated with the content idenified in the content property

property.description: Defines a format to be used to interpret the value of the content attribute.
